road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Near sunset, still without a fish, he decided to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 日落時分，他仍一無所獲，便決定打道回府。

sentences.english: After six weeks, they came back empty-handed.
sentences.chinese: 六個星期過後，他們兩手空空打道回府。

sentences.english: Macquarie and Newbridge go away empty-handed, at least for now.
sentences.chinese: 麥格理和新橋兩手空空地打道回府了，如此。
